Which of the following phenomena can be explained using the urban data presented in the map and table?

choices.label: Urbanization and the rise of an industrial middle class
Suburbanization and middle-class flight from the urban core
Deindustrialization and the rise of service workforce
Industrialization and the rise of an urban working class
Gentrification and the movement of the middle class to the urban core

content.answer: Suburbanization and middle-class flight from the urban core

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain what maps or data imply or illustrate about geographic principles, processes, and outcomes.
